data.actual_result: You are able to send a friend request, even if the action bar is overlapped (see attached video)
data.expected_result: You should not be able to send a friend request, becasue the action bar is overlapping the "send friend request" button, so that you cannot execute two actions at the same time
data.short_description: When overlapping the mutual server action-bar over the "send friend request" button, you will still be able to send a friend request through the overlapped action bar [You may need much time to do it correctly, please note that the overlapped action bar has to be just a bit over the "friend request" button]
data.steps_to_repro: -Go to a user that you want to friend-Scroll the action bar ( [User-Details    Mutual Servers   Mutual Friends] ) just a bit over the green "send friend request" button (not too much!)-Try to click the "send friend request" button on the border of the action bar. Maybe use a pen tool, if you can't do that with your fingers-Scroll the Menu (User-Details, Mutual Servers, Mutual Friends) down to proof, if the friend request has been sent
